attributes.additional_details: KEEP GYM’s open. temperature monitor are installed, hand sanitisers placed everywhere, members have been spraying & wiping clean all kit before and after use & we have a sanitiser fog machine in use too. The gym is infinitely more sanitary a place than most so the numbers simply don't stack up. We ask that in this difficult time you do your upmost to stand up for your constituents so we can help to mitigate the strain on the NHS by keeping people healthy, fit & strong
attributes.background: Keep gyms open during the covid pandemic,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
